mapper.select: SELECT so.id,so.avatar,so.username,so.avatar,so.scope,so.is_enabled,so.create_time ,sr.`name` AS roleName FROM sys_operator AS so LEFT JOIN sys_operator_role AS sor ON so.id = sor.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role AS sr ON sr.id = sor.role_id ORDER BY so.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_operator_role(id, user_id, role_id) VALUES (#{id},#{userId},#{roleId})
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_operator_role SET role_id = #{roleId} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
